component.name: Candela
component.summary: Aplicación de recordatorio de días especiales y eventos

description.p: Candela is a beautiful and simple special days reminder application built with GTK4 and Libadwaita. Keep track of birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, and other special events. Never forget important dates!

Candela, GTK4 ve Libadwaita ile oluşturulmuş güzel ve basit bir özel gün hatırlatıcı uygulamasıdır. Doğum günlerini, yıldönümlerini, bayramları ve diğer özel günleri takip edin. Önemli tarihleri asla unutmayın!

Candela es una aplicación hermosa y simple de recordatorio de días especiales construida con GTK4 y Libadwaita. Lleva un registro de cumpleaños, aniversarios, feriados y otros eventos especiales. ¡Nunca olvides fechas importantes!

ul.li: Add birthdays, anniversaries, and special events
Support for different anniversary types (wedding, relationship, memorial, other)
Quick add for popular holidays (New Year, Christmas, Ramadan, etc.)
Unique icons and colors for each event type
See days remaining until upcoming events
Highlight upcoming events with accent color
